wikipedia_page.main: Charles Lewis Gruneisen (1806–1879) was an English journalist and musical critic.

response: Chorley died at his home in London in 1872, at the age of 63, and is buried there in Brompton Cemetery.The Times, 21 February 1872, p. 5, col. E He left a very considerable estate of £45,000. Fellow critic Charles Lewis Gruneisen wrote in the Athenaeum that Chorley's personality had impeded appreciation of his qualities.
* Charles Lewis Gruneisen. Music critic circa 1845-1853.
